I agree, the Planet or Plastic exhibit is a great way to learn about the issue of plastic waste and how we can make a positive change. Through this exhibit, you can learn about the scale of the plastic waste problem and its impact on the environment, as well as ways we can minimize plastic use and take steps to reduce waste.

The exhibit features a range of installations and interactive displays, including a giant display of plastic bottles and a wall made of plastic bags. Visitors can also explore possible solutions through interactive displays that show how we can change our habits and make a difference.

Overall, the Planet or Plastic exhibit is an eye-opening experience that can inspire visitors to take action in their own lives and make a positive impact on the environment.
